name: Dont Belive
description:
Don't Belive 1.0 is the first version.

Don't Belive an on going game about you..but you will have to pick carefully for Dianne might ruin your plans and have Zedrick for her own.

Its on going so every version has different dialouge's for example

You meet Zedrick in 1.0 and then you and Zedrick go on a festival on 1.3

i started this on 08/21/16 you might find Dont Belive version 2.0 on itch.io.com or ren'py.com but it might take 3 days or 5 or maybe a week to come out because im making the version 2.0 better. you can ask me qustions on my Facebook account

-Kearney Chae Hernandez Solas

if i dont answer them your question might be to violent,personal or either im just really busy

anyway Thanks for downloading

My ren'py username is Juvime :)

The first downloadable file is later and the second downloadable file is newer so i suggest you download the second one Thanks
